Description_lang: Increases the duration of your Evocation ability by ${$m1/1000} sec.

description_blz.en_US: Increases the duration of your Evocation ability by 2 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Aumenta 2 s la duración de tu facultad Evocación.
description_blz.pt_BR: Aumenta em 2 a duração da sua habilidade Evocação.
description_blz.de_DE: Erhöht die Dauer Eures Zaubers 'Hervorrufung' um 2 Sek.
description_blz.en_GB: Increases the duration of your Evocation ability by 2 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Aumenta 2 s la duración de tu facultad Evocación.
description_blz.fr_FR: Augmente la durée de votre technique Evocation de 2 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta la durata di Evocazione di 2 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: Увеличивает время действия "Прилива сил" на 2 сек.
description_blz.zh_TW: 使你喚醒的持續時間延長2秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 使你的唤醒技能的持续时间延长2秒。
